PAQ605.label: Vigorous work activity
PAQ605.text: Next I am going to ask you about the time {you spend/SP spends} doing different types of physical activity in a typical week. Think first about the time {you spend/he spends/she spends} doing work. Think of work as the things that {you have/he has/she has} to do such as paid or unpaid work, household chores, and yard work. Does {your/SP's} work involve vigorous-intensity activity that causes large increases in breathing or heart rate like carrying or lifting heavy loads, digging or construction work for at least 10 minutes continuously?
PAQ605.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAQ610.label: Number of days vigorous work
PAQ610.text: In a typical week, on how many days {do you/does SP} do vigorous-intensity activities as part of {your/his/her} work?
PAQ610.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAD615.label: Minutes vigorous-intensity work
PAD615.text: How much time {do you/does SP} spend doing vigorous-intensity activities at work on a typical day?
PAD615.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

VIGWORK.label: Min per week vigorous work
VIGWORK.text: Time in minutes per week {you/SP} does vigorous-intensity activity at work?

PAQ620.label: Moderate work activity
PAQ620.text: Does {your/SP's} work involve moderate-intensity activity that causes small increases in breathing or heart rate such as brisk walking or carrying light loads for at least 10 minutes continuously?
PAQ620.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAQ625.label: Number of days moderate work
PAQ625.text: In a typical week, on how many days {do you/does SP} do moderate-intensity activities as part of {your/his/her} work?
PAQ625.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAD630.label: Minutes moderate-intensity work
PAD630.text: How much time {do you/does SP} spend doing moderate-intensity activities at work on a typical day?
PAD630.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

MODWORK.label: Min per week moderate work
MODWORK.text: Time in minutes per week {you/SP} does moderate-intensity activity at work?

PAQ635.label: PAQ635
PAQ635.text: The next questions exclude the physical activity at work that you have already mentioned. Now I would like to ask you about the usual way {you travel/SP travels} to and from places. For example to school, for shopping, to work. In a typical week {do you/does SP} walk or use a bicycle for at least 10 minutes continuously to get to and from places?
PAQ635.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAQ640.label: Number of days walk or bicycle
PAQ640.text: In a typical week, on how many days {do you/does SP} walk or bicycle for at least 10 minutes continuously to get to and from places?
PAQ640.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAD645.label: Minutes walk/bicycle for transportation
PAD645.text: How much time {do you/does SP} spend walking or bicycling for travel on a typical day?
PAD645.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

BIKEWALK.label: Min per week ride bike/walk for transportation
BIKEWALK.text: Time in minutes per week {you/SP} ride a bike or walk for transportation?

PAQ650.label: Vigorous recreational activities
PAQ650.text: The next questions exclude the work and transport activities that you have already mentioned. Now I would like to ask you about sports, fitness and recreational activities. In a typical week {do you/does SP} do any vigorous-intensity sports, fitness, or recreational activities that cause large increases in breathing or heart rate like running or basketball for at least 10 minutes continuously?
PAQ650.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAQ655.label: Days vigorous recreational activities
PAQ655.text: In a typical week, on how many days {do you/does SP} do vigorous-intensity sports, fitness or recreational activities?
PAQ655.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAD660.label: Minutes vigorous recreational activities
PAD660.text: How much time {do you/does SP} spend doing vigorous-intensity sports, fitness or recreational activities on a typical day?
PAD660.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

VIGREC.label: Min per week vigorous recreational activity
VIGREC.text: Time in minutes per week {you/SP} does vigorous-intensity recreational activity?

PAQ665.label: Moderate recreational activities
PAQ665.text: In a typical week {do you/does SP} do any moderate-intensity sports, fitness, or recreational activities that cause a small increase in breathing or heart rate such as brisk walking, bicycling, swimming, or volleyball for at least 10 minutes continuously?
PAQ665.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAQ670.label: Days moderate recreational activities
PAQ670.text: In a typical week, on how many days {do you/does SP} do moderate-intensity sports, fitness or recreational activities?
PAQ670.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAD675.label: Minutes moderate recreational activities
PAD675.text: How much time {do you/does SP} spend doing moderate-intensity sports, fitness or recreational activities on a typical day?
PAD675.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

MODREC.label: Min per week moderate recreational activity
MODREC.text: Time in minutes per week {you/SP} does moderate-intensity recreational activity?

PAD680.label: Minutes sedentary activity
PAD680.text: The following question is about sitting at school, at home, getting to and from places, or with friends including time spent sitting at a desk, traveling in a car or bus, reading, playing cards, watching television, or using a computer. Do not include time spent sleeping. How much time {do you/does SP} usually spend sitting on a typical day?
PAD680.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS
